review: Went through the device setup without any issues whatsoever.  Everything was crisp and clean with the remote and the device.  Then the device booted up and updated with our selected content on it and had the issue.  When selecting anything within the main menu or any other menu the selections would scroll uncontrollably until I pushed a button to stop the scrolling.  Sometimes, it would seem fine and one press of a button lead to one action.  But more often than not, just when you thought you were selecting a service or show to watch, the device would start scrolling uncontrollably and select another show 5 selections away from the one you clicked on.  I thought it was a faulty remote at first.  But when I reformatted the device and before any updates, the remote and the device were once again crisp and perfect when inputting the user information.  So it was a problem with the device itself.  I tried the device on another tv, same issue.  Tried taking all remotes that "might have the same frequency" outside the house, same issue.  Tried different tv settings, same issue.  It was very frustrating.  We are going to try a Roku 3 to see if actually works correctly right out of the box.
